name: Primal Groudon EX
author: 5ban Graphics

ancient_trait.name: Ω  Barrier
ancient_trait.effect: Whenever your opponent plays a Trainer card (excluding Pokémon Tools and Stadium cards), prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gaia Volcano
attacks.effect: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 100 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

rule_box:
When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes Primal Groudon-EX, your turn ends.
